reviewText: The restoration on this serial is AMAZING!  The Blu Ray quality and picture are amazing!  Very much worth the inexpensive price. I ordered the 50GB version.  I hope they keep restoring serials.  If I had to sum this up in one word, it would be "WOW"!

I rarely write reviews but these guys inspire me to do so. The quality of this restoration is stunning and very much worthy of the Blu-ray format. Excellent title and a real pleasure to watch recently. Kudos to the company for the sheer amount of hours that must have gone into to restoring this classic serial.
